description: Update your Amazon SES account details.

parameters.name: MailType
parameters.description: The type of email your account will send.

parameters.name: WebsiteURL
parameters.description: The URL of your website. This information helps us better understand the type of content that you plan to send.

parameters.name: AdditionalContactEmailAddresses
parameters.description: Additional email addresses that you would like to be notified regarding Amazon SES matters. (string) ---

parameters.name: ProductionAccessEnabled
parameters.description: Indicates whether or not your account should have production access in the current Amazon Web Services Region. If the value is false, then your account is in the sandbox. When your account is in the sandbox, you can only send email to verified identities. If the value is true, then your account has production access. When your account has production access, you can send email to any address. The sending quota and maximum sending rate for your account vary based on your specific use case.
